'''Primal Beams''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

There are a combination of mechanisms that transmit Primal Beams, including [[Everlight Cell]]s.

Sometimes beams can be block by walls and [[Obscuring Cell]]s can cause them to become transparent to allow the beam to pass through.
